sentence.Network_en: The playwrights are sure - handed enough to turn out top - drawer scripts.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些剧作家足够自信可以写出顶级的剧本.

sentence.Network_en: Success is not guaranteed. It is not handed to you. Success is earned.
sentence.Network_cn: 成功无法保证，并非唾手可得。成功必须靠自己去争取。

sentence.Network_en: But legal experts are not sure if such a charge can stick.
sentence.Network_cn: 但法律专家们不能肯定这一指控是否成立。

list.abs: When working with electricity , make sure your hands are dry ., 带电作业时 , 要保证你的手是干燥的.
check The Grip section to make sure your hand is positioned correctly on the handle .检查握部以确定你的手正确地放置在握柄上。
check your body position to make sure your hands are higher than your head and then … when your body is stable and aligned … start your next pulldown .检查你的身体位置，确认你的双手高于你的头，你的身体稳定并呈一直线……再开始你下一次水下划水。
require sure hands and considerable vigor ., 却需要坚定的双手和相当的体力.

sentences.sentence: "promising playwrights...sure-handed enough to turn out top-drawer scripts"

auth_sentence.content: We're not sure when the curfew is tonight.

auth_sentence.content: Blossom is a sure sign that spring has arrived.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Blossom is a sure sign that spring has arrived.

auth_sentence.content: We need to make sure they are well used.
